mapper.sql: ID, EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME, ADDRESS, CHANNEL_NUM, OPTICAL_FIBER_POSITION, COMMUNICATE, FIBER, THERMOMETER, OVER_TEMPERATURE, DATE
mapper.select: SELECT CHANNEL_NUM, SUM( COMMUNICATE ) AS COMMUNICATE, SUM( FIBER ) AS FIBER, SUM( THERMOMETER ) AS THERMOMETER, SUM( OVER_TEMPERATURE ) AS OVER_TEMPERATURE FROM hq_static_failures WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DATE >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DATE < #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY CHANNEL_NUM
mapper.insert: insert into hq_static_failures (EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME, ADDRESS, CHANNEL_NUM, OPTICAL_FIBER_POSITION, COMMUNICATE, FIBER, THERMOMETER, OVER_TEMPERATURE, DATE) values ( #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opticalFiberPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communicate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fiber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thermometer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overTemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into hq_static_failures
EQUIPMENT_ID,
EQUIPMENT_NAME,
ADDRESS,
CHANNEL_NUM,
OPTICAL_FIBER_POSITION,
COMMUNICATE,
FIBER,
THERMOMETER,
OVER_TEMPERATURE,
DATE,

mapper.update:
update hq_static_failures
EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_NUM = #{channelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTICAL_FIBER_POSITION = #{opticalFiberPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMUNICATE = #{communicate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FIBER = #{fiber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
THERMOMETER = #{thermometer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OVER_TEMPERATURE = #{overTemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DATE = #{date,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hq_static_failures set EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_NUM = #{channelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTICAL_FIBER_POSITION = #{opticalFiberPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMUNICATE = #{communicate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FIBER = #{fiber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, THERMOMETER = #{thermometer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OVER_TEMPERATURE = #{overTemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATE = #{date,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
